power.title: Call of the Beast
power.fluff: You draw forth the savagery that dwells in every creature, compelling your enemies to fight without forethought or plan

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target hears the call of the beast until the end of your next turn.

While it hears the call, the target cannot gain combat advantage. Also, each time the target makes an attack on its own turn and does not include your ally nearest to it as a target of that attack, it takes psychic damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to 6 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When you learn this power, you can choose to add the Beast Form keyword to it. You can retrain this choice just like retraining the power.

power.title: Chill Wind
power.fluff: A howling gust of icy wind savages your enemies, scattering them

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d4 + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d4 + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and slide up to 3 squares.

power.title: Fire Hawk
power.fluff: A hawk of flame swoops on your foe, burning it, and then hovers ready to swoop in for another attack should the foe's defenses falter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, you can use Swooping Fire attack at-will against the primary target.
You can also make a Swooping Fire attack when something allows you to make a ranged basic attack against the primary target for the same duration.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: The primary target is within 10 squares of you and takes any action that can provoke reactive strikes

power.title: Flame Seed
power.fluff: You hurl a seed infused with primal energy at your foes and when it strikes the ground, the seed explodes in a fiery burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The squares adjacent to the target's space become a fiery zone until the end of your next turn.
Any enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes fire damage equal equal to your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 5 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

power.title: Grasping Claw
power.fluff: You rend and tear your foe with your claws, leaving it hobbled

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This power counts as a melee basic attack.

power.title: Grasping Tide
power.fluff: A vortex of water appears amidst your foes, drawing them into its grasp

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area creates a zone of water vortex until the end of your next turn.
While the zone remains, you can use the Tide's Pull attack at-will, using the burst origin square as the point of origin.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A primary target leaves the zone

section.name: Crit:
section.text: The target loses the rest of its actions this turn.

power.title: Jolt of Lightning
power.fluff: A bolt of lightning streaks down from empty air, crippling your foe with a numbing pulse of power

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Magic Stones
power.fluff: Three small stones clutched in your had glow with green light as you launch them, then explode when they strike your foes

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d4 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 2d4 + Wisdom modifier damage if you only target one creature.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d4 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 4d4 + Wisdom modifier damage if you only target one creature.

power.title: Pounce
power.fluff: You leap at your foe, catching it off guard

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to the first creature that attacks it before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Reaping Claws
power.fluff: Your primal power courses through a foe you rend, wracking it with pain the next time it avoids an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time an ally misses the target with an attack before the end of your next turn, the target takes damage equal to your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2 + your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Savage Rend
power.fluff: You rake your foe with your claws, setting it up for the kill

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and slide up to 2 squares.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This power counts as a melee basic attack.

power.title: Spirit Briar
power.fluff: Phantom thorns gouge the flesh of the foe that moves against them

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose either yourself or one ally you can see.
If the target ends its next turn adjacent to the chosen character, the target takes poison damage equal to your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Poison damage equal to 3 + your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Poison damage equal to 6 + your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Storm Spike
power.fluff: A bolt of lightning spears your foe and charges the air around it, causing a second spark to erupt if the enemy doesn't move away

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target doesn't move at least 2 squares away from its current space before the end of its next turn, it takes lightning damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Lightning damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Lightning damage equal to 6 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Swarming Locusts
power.fluff: Insects launch from you to vex your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of swarming locusts until the end of your next turn.
While in the zone, enemies grant combat advantage.

power.title: Thorn Whip
power.fluff: Barbed vines whip out from the wood of your staff or totem to lash and ensnare your pre

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and pull 3 squares.
